Package model

Class ToDoModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.ToDoModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ToDoModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
The model for the whole data of the ToDoList. The model main function will be to hold the entire data of the ToDo application. The model have some basic things which it can do such as get some task, change task's property, or lists. etc.
Author:
Ofer Greenberg, Quan Nguyen, Quang Vu, Allen David El.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • removeList

      public model.ToDoList removeList​(java.lang.String id)
      Remove a list with the same name as the id. If there is not a list with that name, return null
      Parameters:
      id - the name of the list to be removed
      Returns:
      the ToDoList has the same name as the id or null

    • renameList

      public boolean renameList​(java.lang.String oldName, java.lang.String newName)
      takes original list id (name) and replaces it with the newName
      Parameters:
      oldName - string representation of list id/name
      newName - string of new id/name of list
      Returns:
      true if list was found

    • getList

      public model.ToDoList getList​(java.lang.String name)
      Author: Quang Vu Purpose: this method will search through lists and returns the list with param name
      Parameters:
      name - string represent the name of list that user method want to find
      Returns:
      ToDoList object, null if not found.

    • isImportant

      public boolean isImportant​(java.lang.String taskList, java.lang.String taskName)
      Check if the task in taskList which has the name of taskName is important or not. True if it is and false if it is not.
      Parameters:
      taskList - the name of the list to be get the task from
      taskName - the task which will be checked.
      Returns:
      boolean indicate if a task is important.

      Parameters:

      taskName - the task which will be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the task is done

      nameList - String represent the list contains the task
      newTask - String represent the name of the task
      Returns:
      true if add operation is success and false if not.

      newTask - the task which will be change the importance.
      newStatus - indicate if the task is importance or not
      Returns:
      true if successfully change the important field of the task

      Parameters:
      listName - String represent the name of the list contains the task need to change the due date
      taskName - String represent the name of the task need to change the due date
      dueDate - the new due date
      Returns:
      true if successfully change the due date

    • setTaskNote

      public boolean setTaskNote​(java.lang.String nameList, java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String note)
      This method changes the note of the task in the data structure model to the newNote String parameter
      Parameters:
      nameList - is the list that the task is located in
      taskName - is the task that is located in the listName
      note - is the note to set the task to
      Returns:
      true if the set operation is success and false if it is not

      Parameters:

      taskName - the task identifier
      newLocation - the new location string
      Returns:
